member_organisations:
Memorandum of understanding is under development with the following organisations for partnership: 
 
(1) NILE BASIN INITIATIVE 
(2) NILE BASIN CAPACITY BUILDING   NETWORK (NBCBN) 
(3) AFRICAN SUPREME AUDIT INSTITUTION (AFROSAI) 
 
The countries where potential membership is, is based aaround the Nile River Basin and Niger River Basin.
fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
(1) Environmental Impact Assessmrnt Directive. 
(2) EU Water Framework Directive (WFD, 2000/60/EC) 
(3) The Groundwater Directive (GWD, 2006/118/EC) 
(4) Environmental Quality Standards Directive (EQSD, 2008/105/EC) 
(5) Floods Directive (FD, 2007/60/EC)
organisation_name: Natural Environment Technology in Africa (NET Africa’s)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The objective of the organisation is to work in partnership with governments in emerging and developing countries, innovators, universities and policy makers and others for understanding the interactions between the economy and the environment. 
This activities include: 
(1) Environmental data collection and mapping. 
(2) Environmental auditing (ISO 14001:2015) 
(3) Environmental economic accounting 
(4) Mobilising finance for climate innovation. 
(5) publication and distribution of reports and studies. 
(6) peace and reconciliation 
 
 
Currently focusing on Nile River and Niger River for environmental Management
inter_groups:
(1) Climate change, sustainable development and biodiversity. 
(2) Seas, rivers, Islands and coastal areas. 
(3) Social economy, social economy enterprises, social entrepreneurship and third sector.
relevant_communication: EU Public Relations events organised by the EU
